About_Desc: Welcome to Lingua! I'm passionate about facilitating effective communication through language learning and consultancy. With years of experience, I aim to create tailored language courses and enriching experiences for all learners.

CATALOGUE_INTRO.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to Lingua Nature's catalogue, your portal to language learning amidst Portugal's stunning landscapes...

São Miguel Island.TITLE: São Miguel Island
São Miguel Island.DESCRIPTION: Explore our e-learning journey, where language mastery intertwines with São Miguel's stunning landscapes...

Lisbon.TITLE: Lisbon
Lisbon.DESCRIPTION: Lisbon is a beautiful city known for its vibrant culture and stunning architecture.

LINGUA_SERVICES_QUERY: If you have any work or queries related to our Lingua services, feel free to send us a message. We're here to help!
EMAIL_SENT_MESSAGE: Your email has been sent. Thank you for your message. You will soon receive a confirmation email from us. We're making every effort to respond to you as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience and interest. We remain available for any other request.
APP_DESCRIPTION_FOOTER: We offer engaging learning experiences amidst hiking and camping adventures.

WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to Lingua! We offer a variety of services to meet your needs.
LANGUAGE_FACILITATION_DESCRIPTION: Unlock the power of effective communication through our language facilitation services.
CONSULTING_DESCRIPTION: Expert consulting services to guide you in achieving your language-related goals.
INDIVIDUAL_COURSES_DESCRIPTION: Personalized language courses tailored to your specific needs and learning style.
SUMMER_CAMP_DESCRIPTION: Immerse yourself in language learning while enjoying a fun and enriching summer experience.
LANGUAGES_LEARNING: Our language learning app offers a diverse approach to language learning, catering to different learning styles.
ANNA_INTRODUCTION_1: Welcome to my world of passion and creativity, where I offer a range of exquisite services to make your life extraordinary.
ANNA_INTRODUCTION_2: From personalized consultations to unique experiences, I bring a touch of magic to every moment. Let's embark on a journey together and turn your dreams into reality.
